amendatorysection.catchline: Tribunal of this state; contacts with tribunal of another state; limitations.
amendatorysection.para: A tribunal of this state exercising personal jurisdiction over a nonresident in a proceeding under the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act or under other law of this state relating to a support order or recognizing a support order of a foreign country or political subdivision on the basis of comity may receive evidence from another state pursuant to section 42-729, communicate with a tribunal of another state pursuant to section 42-730, and obtain discovery through a tribunal of another state pursuant to section 42-731. In all other respects, sections 42-714 to 42-748 do not apply and the tribunal shall apply the procedural and substantive law of this state.
